sqlMap.select: select alarm_cont as cont, alarm_type as type, alarm_chk as chk from alarm where user_id = #user_id# order by alarm_no desc
sqlMap.delete: delete from alarm where user_id = #user# and alarm_cont = #cont# and alarm_type = #type#
sqlMap.insert: insert into alarm (alarm_no, user_id, alarm_cont, alarm_type, alarm_date, alarm_chk) values(alarm_no_seq.nextval,#user#,#cont#,#type#, sysdate, 0)
